fr.sii.ogham.html.inliner

Class EveryImageInliner

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.html.inliner.EveryImageInliner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageInliner

    public class EveryImageInliner
extends Object
implements ImageInliner
    Applies in sequence all provided decorated inliners. This may be useful to allow several strategies to be applied on the same message content according to the images.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
